      • load

        public static void load( loadRoutine,
         onSuccess,
         onFail)
        This method will initialize a JavaFX program as specified by the Task loadRoutine.
        Parameters:
        loadRoutine - the initialization task. All operations in the task must run outside of a FX thread. Use Platform.runLater() to invoke FX thread dependent operations. //@param stage the stage
        onSuccess - success handler
        onFail - failure handler
